articles.description: The study covered 3,103 people with tinnitus from 48 countries, mostly from the UK and the US. It found that 40% of those displaying symptoms of Covid-19 simultaneously experience a worsening of their tinnitus.
articles.content: Tinnitus is a common condition that causes the perception of noise or ringing in the ears and head (Source: Thinkstock Images)Tinnitus is a common condition that causes the perception of noise or rin… [+1325 chars]

articles.title: COVID-19 vaccine race to intensify in January 2021: Skoltech expert - Times Now
articles.description: Most reports on the third phase clinical trials of different coronavirus vaccines, including Russia's Sputnik V, are expected to come out in January, as well as reports on any serious side effects.
